text: "You Gotta Be" is a song recorded by British singer-songwriter Des'ree from her second studio album, I Ain't Movin' (1994). It was released in August 1994 through Sony Soho Square Records. Des'ree co-wrote and co-produced the song with Ashley Ingraham. It is a downtempo soul song that ends the chorus with, "Love will save the day." The song reached the top ten in Australia and the UK, after its re-release in 1999. It also reached the top five in Spain and on the Billboard Hot 100 in the US. ==Charts and sales== ===Weekly charts=== ====Original version==== Chart (1994–1995) Peak position Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) 31 Europe (European Dance Radio) 1 ====1999 remix==== Chart (1999) Peak position Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) 32 Iceland (Íslenski Listinn Topp 40) 9 Netherlands (Dutch Top 40 Tipparade) 20 Spain (AFYVE) 1 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (1994) Position Australia (ARIA) 69 New Zealand (Recorded Music NZ) 31 Chart (1995) Position Canada Adult Contemporary (RPM) 38 France (SNEP) 87 US Billboard Hot 100 20 ===Certifications and sales=== ==References== Category:1994 songs Category:Soul songs
title: You Gotta Be
